translations.landing.product.comparison.title: Flyto2 vs Traditional
translations.landing.product.cta.description: Get started for free. No credit card required. Works offline.
translations.landing.product.cta.title: Ready to experience human-in-the-loop automation?
translations.landing.product.hero.description: Traditional RPA fails when human judgment is needed. Flyto2 makes human oversight a core feature from day one, not an afterthought.
translations.landing.product.hero.title: A Workflow Platform That
translations.landing.product.problem.allOrNothing.des: Traditional RPA runs until completion or crash. No middle ground. When processing 1,000 records, you won't know something's wrong until the damage has spread across the entire dataset.
translations.landing.product.problem.cloud.desc: Enterprise data often can't leave your network. Most modern automation platforms require cloud connectivity, making them unsuitable for air-gapped environments or strict compliance requirements.
translations.landing.product.problem.cloud.title: Cloud Dependency
translations.landing.product.problem.noApproval.desc: Most RPA tools can't pause for human approval. In regulated industries where every action needs verification, this makes critical processes impossible to automate.
translations.landing.product.problem.noApproval.title: No Approval Workflow
translations.landing.product.problem.subtitle: Most automation tools have a fundamental flaw: they're designed to run without human intervention.
translations.landing.product.problem.title: Problems Traditional RPA
translations.landing.product.problem.validation.desc: Data validation in traditional RPA is bolted on, not built in. When data doesn't match expectations, workflows fail silently, leaving corrupted records with no clear recovery path.
translations.landing.product.problem.validation.title: Validation is an Afterthought
translations.landing.product.solution.approval.desc: Build approval checkpoints directly into your workflow. Critical actions wait for human confirmation before proceeding.
translations.landing.product.solution.approval.title: Human Approval Steps
translations.landing.product.solution.audit.desc: Every action has screenshots, logs, and timestamps. Know exactly what happened, when, and who approved it. Perfect for compliance.
translations.landing.product.solution.audit.title: Full Audit Trail
translations.landing.product.solution.builtin.desc: Data validation isn't an add-on. Every module validates inputs and outputs. Malformed data stops the workflow immediately with clear error messages.
translations.landing.product.solution.builtin.title: Built-in Validation
translations.landing.product.solution.offline.desc: No cloud dependencies. No phoning home. Deploy on your infrastructure with complete data sovereignty.
translations.landing.product.solution.offline.title: 100% Offline
translations.landing.product.solution.pause.desc: Every workflow can pause for human review. Run one, confirm it's right, then continue batch processing. No more blind automation.
translations.landing.product.solution.pause.title: Pause Anytime
translations.landing.product.solution.rollback.desc: Mistakes don't mean starting over. Roll back to a checkpoint, fix the issue, and continue from where you left off.
translations.landing.product.solution.rollback.title: Rollback & Resume
translations.landing.product.solution.subtitle: Flyto2 doesn't distinguish between 'automation logic' and 'user interaction'. They're the same thing.
translations.landing.product.solution.title: Why Workflows and Interfaces Must Be
translations.landing.product.validation.step1.desc: Every module validates inputs before execution. Wrong data types? Missing fields? The workflow stops immediately with clear error messages.
translations.landing.product.validation.step1.title: Input Validation
translations.landing.product.validation.step2.desc: Data flowing between modules must conform to defined schemas. No silent type coercion, no 'sometimes it works' scenarios.
translations.landing.product.validation.step2.title: Schema Enforcement
translations.landing.product.validation.step3.desc: After each step completes, outputs are validated against expected schemas. If anything's off, you know before it affects downstream processes.
translations.landing.product.validation.step3.title: Output Validation
translations.landing.product.validation.step4.desc: At configurable intervals, Flyto2 creates checkpoints. If validation fails later, you can roll back to the last known good state.
translations.landing.product.validation.step4.title: Checkpoint Creation
translations.landing.product.validation.subtitle: Most automation failures aren't logic errors - they're data errors that weren't caught in time.
translations.landing.product.validation.title: Why Validation Must Be Built Into
